Title: Prohibits the sale or purchase of certain items as scrap
Summary: Prohibits the sale or purchase of certain items as scrap: any metal items bearing markings of any government entity, utility company, cemetery or railroad items; preempts local laws.
LawCode: Amd §§69-e, 69-f, 69-g & 69-i, ren §69-h to be §69-i, add §§69-h & 69-j, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to licensing of scrap producers in the state and certain cities
